title: [Ta'Illistim, Kaerinar Wey]
description: Carefully tended gardens line the wey, each plant marked with a small silver sign placed on a stake amongst the stems.  Apparently cultivated for culinary as well as medicinal purposes, the flora ranges from acantha to rosemary, and includes a few odd unmarked specimens as well.

Carefully tended gardens line the wey, each plant marked with a small silver sign placed on a stake amongst the stems.  Apparently cultivated for culinary as well as medicinal purposes, the flora ranges from acantha to rosemary, and includes a few odd unmarked specimens as well.  Moonlight dances across the garden, casting all in a silvery sheen.

Carefully tended gardens line the wey, each plant marked with a small silver sign placed on a stake amongst the stems.  Apparently cultivated for culinary as well as medicinal purposes, the flora ranges from rosemary to acantha, and includes a few tubers and patches of vegetables as well.
